title: Master Copywriting Bible
description: Eugene Schwartz, Gary Halbert, Ogilvy, Dan Kennedy, Hormozi, Brunson, Cialdini — full framework. Headline formulas, psychological principles, offer construction, copy checklist.

title: Hook Library — 505 Battle-Tested Hooks
description: 505 hooks across 14 categories: pain, curiosity, social proof, enemy, pattern interrupt, story, contrarian, authority, fear, transformation, specificity, time, niche-specific.

title: Awareness Levels Guide
description: Eugene Schwartz's 5 awareness levels applied to RestCalm, PelvaCare, LumaFlex, KYVO, and golf niches. Copy approach, headlines, traffic sources, and funnel architecture for each level.

title: Copy Research SOP
description: Pre-writing research protocol: Amazon review mining, Reddit research, YouTube comment mining, Gethookd competitor analysis, customer avatar template, Voice of Customer document, Big Idea and Unique Mechanism creation.

title: Image Generation Bible
description: 6-component prompt formula, platform specs, product playbooks for EMS devices, supplements, and golf. Image type templates, advanced techniques, and quality checklist.

title: RestCalm — Full Product Pipeline
description: Complete SOP 01-04 for RestCalm EMS Relief Pad. COGS $8, sell $49.99, targeting 50-70yr women with RLS. Product page + advertorial live on Anakampsi.

title: Facebook Ad Script — 15 Second Template
description: 15-second Facebook/Instagram ad script template with health niche examples. Hook → problem → solution → CTA structure.

title: Facebook Ad Script — 60 Second VSL Lite
description: 60-second VSL lite template using Agora + Brunson frameworks. Full hook, story, mechanism, offer, CTA breakdown with health niche examples.

title: Advertorial Template — 4 Styles
description: 4 advertorial styles: story-based, news-style, listicle, and editorial. Includes compliance guide for health claims.

title: Landing Page Template — Section by Section
description: Full landing page framework: hero, social proof, problem, mechanism, offer stack, guarantee, FAQ, CTA. Includes conversion psychology notes for each section.

title: Email Sequence Templates
description: Welcome (5 emails), abandoned cart (3), post-purchase upsell (3), win-back (3). Full sequence templates with subject lines and copy.

title: Dropship Pipeline SOP — Full Orchestrator
description: One-prompt orchestrator that runs the full 4-stage pipeline: Brand Kit → Foundation Docs → Advertorial + Creative (parallel) → Builder. ~20-25 min end-to-end.
